meanings.definition: A number expressing the central or typical value in a set of data.
meanings.sent1: The averages of the test scores showed how students performed overall.
meanings.sent2: The average of the temperatures this week was 75 degrees.
meanings.sent3: Calculating the averages of the rainfall amounts made the weather report more interesting.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of numbers, the averages stood out like a lighthouse in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The concept of averages helps us understand the middle ground in a group of values.

meanings.definition: A typical amount, rate, level, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The averages of customer satisfaction were higher this month.
meanings.sent2: On average, people spend about 2 hours on social media daily.
meanings.sent3: The averages of ice cream consumption in winter made the researchers chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness reached levels that were above the averages of generosity.
meanings.sent5: The averages of happiness in the town painted a picture of contentment.
